name: Don't Be A Square
description:
When the Evil Rectangle wants to turn all the Squares into Rectangles and become the leader of the town there is one Square that stands in his way. That's the character you are controlling as the player. You need to collect all 20 orange Gummies in each level to move on and get to the Evil Rectangles base and stop him. Platform your way through 20 levels made up of 4 Worlds. And hopefully you are tough enough to defeat the 4 bosses at the end of each world.

Game Features:
  • Keyboard & Controller Support
  • 4 Worlds with 5 levels in each (20 levels total)
  • 4 Bosses to beat
  • Easy mode (Allows you to take 3 hits instead of 1 & gives you a Gummy after 10 minutes and then more every 1 minute after)
